subject: Management
title: No-Meeting Days
description: A short lesson to help you apply No-Meeting Days.

hook.text: Basecamp's no-meeting Wednesdays gave developers their most productive day of the week.

buildup.text: When every day has meetings, there's no day for sustained deep work. Creativity starves.

discovery.text: One meeting-free day per week can increase productive output by 35% according to MIT research.

twist.text: People resist it at first. Then they discover how much they can accomplish in unbroken time.

climax.text: Pick one day. Make it sacred. No internal meetings. Watch what your team produces.

punchline.text: One protected day can transform an entire week.

quiz.question: What effect do no-meeting days have on productivity?
options: They significantly increase productive output by enabling deep work
They reduce collaboration and harm team performance
They only benefit individual contributors, not managers
